p: Ten (10) µL of EO dilutions were injected in to the haemocele through the last left pro-leg of larvae using a 1 mL syringe. The prick area was decontaminated with 70% ethanol prior to administration of EO. Larvae containing dishes were then covered with a lid and kept in an aerobic incubator at 37ºC. 10 µL Sterile PBS with 0.05% Tween 80 was administered to negative control group (n = 10).
